body_html:
I did get it working by forcing TensorFlow to use GPU for only matrix multiplication. It was posted here:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33624048/fail-to-run-word-embedding-example-in-tensorflow-tutorial-with-gpus

I hoping it will be fixed soon.

body:
I did get it working by forcing TensorFlow to use GPU for only matrix multiplication. It was posted here:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33624048/fail-to-run-word-embedding-example-in-tensorflow-tutorial-with-gpus

I hoping it will be fixed soon.
